title: Poirot

awardsHtml:
6 wins & 17 nominations

Primetime Emmy Awards

2015 Nominee Primetime Emmy
Outstanding Television Movie
Michele Buck (executive producer) - Damien Timmer (executive producer) - Hilary Strong (executive producer) - Mathew Prichard (executive producer) - Karen Thrussell (executive producer) - David Boulter (producer) (for "Curtain: Poirot's Last Case")

Janis Gould (For episodes 2, 3, 6, 7 and 8.)
1992 Nominee BAFTA TV Award
Best Costume Design
Robin Fraser-Paye (For episodes 2, 3, 6, 7 and 8.)
1992 Nominee BAFTA TV Award
Best Costume Design
Elizabeth Waller (For episodes 1, 4, 5, 9 and 10.)
1991 Nominee BAFTA TV Award
Best Drama Series/Serial
Brian Eastman

(For the show "Agatha Christie's Poirot: Curtain, Poirot's Last Case".)
2015 Winner OFTA Television Award

David Suchet (For the show "Agatha Christie's Poirot: Curtain, Poirot's Last Case".)
2015 Nominee OFTA Television Award

(For the show "Agatha Christie's Poirot: Curtain, Poirot's Last Case".)
2014 Winner OFTA TV Hall of Fame
Television Programs
(For thirteen seasons, David Suchet gave life to one of the most enduring fictional detectives in history, one of the most prominent series ever featured on PBS' program "Mystery".)
